text: It is forbidden to offer or expose any article for sale in said United States Capitol Grounds; to display any sign, placard, or other form of advertisement therein; to solicit fares, alms, subscriptions, or contributions therein.
historical:

title.text: Parks, Public Buildings, Grounds, and Space. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Sale of goods, advertising, or begging forbidden.
